title: kaa murugayya
sahitya:
kA murugayyA kaliyuga meyyA karuNai mA marugayyA kayyAdu enaiyinum



anupallavi



pAmaranEn nAn Ayinum nin pada bhakti tandaruLi ennai nI muTrilumE



caraNam



kAma dahanarAna shankara shiva kAmavardhani aruL kumara
kSEma kara kavi kunjaradAsanAm sAmi unaiyE nambinEn ayyA
